‘silon deli niwus puwathpatha’ aarambha kota 1914 di dinamina puwathpathe ayithiya da labagena 1923 di obsarwar pathraya milata gaththe ya. 1930 wasare ‘silumina’ puwathpatha da 1932 thinakaran puwathpatha da aarambha kota samastha aasiyawema pramukha puwathpath aayathanayak bawata eksath prawruththi pathra aayathanaya path kele ya.wijayawardhana mahathage sithata thama rata wenuwen itu kala yuthu meheya pilibanda dadi awabodhayak athi wuye widesha balawega magin thama rate palana katayuthu kerehi wu balapam ya.mahajana niyojithayan peni sitina aanduwak lankawe pihituwima pilibandawa awashyathawa ekala merata ingirisi palakaya washayen katayuthu kala sar henri makalamge hithuwakkara katayuthu nisa merata boho deshapreminta danennata wiya.engalanthaye dirgha kalayak gatha kala da wijayawardhanayan kisi witeka siya rata ha swadeshika de kerehi athi almata eya badhawak kara gaththe natha.wijayawardhana mahatha rate abhiwruddhiya athi kirimata siya puwathpath yoda gaththa da lokaye sesu nidahas jathin atharata thama rate janathawa da ekathu kirima ee mahathage parama abhilashaya wiya.

galu muwadora pitiyama ekama his godak bawata path karamin merata mayi dina ithihasayata nawa parichchedayak ek kala eekabaddha wipakshaye mayi dina raliya athishayinma sarthaka kara ganima udesa diwa ra nobala kapawu eekabaddha wipakshaye siyaluma paksha nayakayanta, parlimenthu manthriwarunta, palath sabha mathi amathiwarunta, palath palana aayathanawala hitapu sabhapathiwarunta, sabhikayanta, wruththiya samithi ha anekuth siyaluma sanwidhanawalata menma mema jana raliyata dawanthama shakthiya ennath karamin eeta ekwu podu janathawa da me mohothedi hada pathlenma nagena kruthawedithwayen yukthawa sihipath karami.
